name: Turning the Theater(翻转剧场)
description:
Turning the Theatre is about a director who has lost his memory and tries to recover his memory through fragments. It shows the three stages of an ordinary person's life -- a dim childhood, a first-year student and a worker entering society. Each stage is a new scene, and new mechanics emerge as the game progresses.

The player needs to edit and rotate the game map to get the key to the end of the level and complete the exploration of memor

We tried to add some plot to the game, but it wasn't ideal. But we have faith in the level design!! Hope you enjoy our game!!

It's not a perfect game, and there are some bugs. But we want our games to be fun!!

Operations

ad：walk

w：climb

s：fall from platform

e：interacte with keys or other things

space：jump
